item.description: Very well said!!!! You and Patrick should run a campaign!!! xoxox

item.title: Comment on Graeme’s Newborn Shoot by mimi
item.dc:creator: mimi
item.description: Oh Graeme I think your one lucky little boy and big sis Maggie will definitely show you the ropes.
item.content:encoded: Oh Graeme I think your one lucky little boy and big sis Maggie will definitely show you the ropes.

item.title: Comment on Our Tiny Dancer by mimi
item.dc:creator: mimi
item.description: From the roller coaster ride of the week to "who knows why blood work form Boston needs to go to Cali" all turned out smoothly in the end. Maggies recital was an incredible "hit" and the birth of Graeme honestly as special as it gets. Congratulations to Patrick Cara Maggie and yes Graeme...welcome to a wonderful world.
item.content:encoded: From the roller coaster ride of the week to “who knows why blood work form Boston needs to go to Cali” all turned out smoothly in the end. Maggies recital was an incredible “hit” and the birth of Graeme honestly as special as it gets. Congratulations to Patrick Cara Maggie and yes Graeme…welcome to a wonderful world.

item.title: Comment on Waiting on baby brother by Marcia Horton
item.dc:creator: Marcia Horton
item.description: Wonderful idea, great photo's, beautiful family and I can't wait for my next grand nephew to be born. Lots of great people in June. Love to all.
item.content:encoded: Wonderful idea, great photo’s, beautiful family and I can’t wait for my next grand nephew to be born. Lots of great people in June. Love to all.

item.description: Those are fantastic! Keep up the great photography, Maggie!!!
item.content:encoded: Those are fantastic! Keep up the great photography, Maggie!!!

item.title: Comment on The Nana. by Susan
item.dc:creator: Susan
item.description: That is such wonderful news Cara!!!! She is a wonderful, amazing, awe inspiring woman! That is a completely different generation of people. We saw it in my dad also! She will continue to recover with all of the love and support she is surrounded by!! xoxoxo
item.content:encoded: That is such wonderful news Cara!!!! She is a wonderful, amazing, awe inspiring woman! That is a completely different generation of people. We saw it in my dad also! She will continue to recover with all of the love and support she is surrounded by!! xoxoxo

item.title: Comment on Totally Tubular! by Susan Harrington

item.description: She's a little trooper! Hopefully that will be the end of her ear infections and no more antibiotics!! ❤️
item.content:encoded: She’s a little trooper! Hopefully that will be the end of her ear infections and no more antibiotics!! ❤️
